Storeroom, Furniture, Technique, Telephone, Internet, Cable-TV, Elevator, Heating system: central, gas, electricity, Hot water: gas, electricity 
 65 sqm (one bedroom) apartment at 14 Krtsanisi str. 
Brand new, high standard, newly furnished apartment on 5th floor in 7 story building overlooks the city. Quiet street and clean air of this area is definitely a big bonus.
This apartment is perfect for companies looking for a long term renting solutions for their employees. The asking price is $700 US per month. contact:555335044 Nino
